parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: Direction of recall. Use either forward or backward

parameters.name: input
parameters.description: Input method.  Use either keyboard, keypad, or mouse

parameters.name: UseAudio
parameters.description: Whether to use audio recordings of numbers.  1=on, 0 = off

parameters.name: AllowBackspace
parameters.description: Allow users to backspace over responses? 1=yes,0=no

parameters.name: AllowSkip
parameters.description: Allow users to skip over cells? 1=yes, 0=no

parameters.name: version
parameters.description: Type of test. 1 indicates traditional low-to-high; 2 indicates high-to-low; 3 indicates a staircase.

parameters.name: endearly
parameters.description: Whether a list length should end when the criterion is met.  I.e., if you get 1 correct, skip to the next length.

parameters.name: perlength
parameters.description: The number of trials at each length

parameters.name: criterion
parameters.description: The number that must be correct to proceed
